participant_1.background:
I love to weld and rock climb!
I drink milk to help me digest my large meals.
i enjoy jazz music.
I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid.
I enjoy strong female characters in my movies.

participant_2.background:
I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
i am allergic to shellfish.
My time is my most valuable possession.
I took a spin in my Toyota Land Cruiser before heading to my favorite dance club to celebrate my birthday.

content.text: Hello there! Hope you are having a great day.
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! I am just getting ready to head out to my favorite dance club to celebrate my birthday.
Happy Birthday! That sounds like a lot of fun!
Thank you! I'm excited to get started!
What are your hobbies?
I love to go dancing, I am also a big fan of music and movies. I also love to spend time with my dog.
That's great! I love to weld and rock climb. I also enjoy jazz music.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try rock climbing. I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
That's cool! I'm not much of a social media person either. I prefer to spend my time in person with friends and family.
Me too! I think it's more meaningful to connect with people in person.
I agree!
What do you do for work?
I'm a welder, and I also do some rock climbing on the side.
That's awesome! I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
I understand! I have a dog too, and he loves to run and play.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He's the best dog in the world!
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and loving.
They are!
I need to get going now, but it was great talking to you!
You too! I hope you have a great rest of your birthday!
Thank you! I will!
